title: Solar Panel Soiling Loss Analysis
description: An O&M manager wants to determine if the cost of cleaning the panels at a solar farm is justified by the expected gain in energy production.

tasks.description: Measure the current soiling loss by comparing the output of a dirty panel to a recently cleaned reference panel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the current soiling loss is 4%.

tasks.description: Calculate the expected annual energy gain if the panels were cleaned, based on the farm's total capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the potential increase in MWh.

tasks.description: Estimate the revenue from the extra energy based on the expected PPA price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the potential revenue gain.

tasks.description: Compare the revenue gain to the cost of a panel cleaning service. Recommend for or against cleaning.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the revenue gain exceeds the cleaning cost and recommends scheduling a cleaning.
